meanings.definition: A person who reads or writes in Braille.
meanings.sent1: The braillists at the library helped me find the Braille books.
meanings.sent2: The school for the blind has a team of dedicated braillists.
meanings.sent3: The braillists had a race to see who could read the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The braillists' fingers danced across the pages like skilled pianists.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the braillists' kindness in teaching me Braille.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are proficient in Braille.
meanings.sent1: The braillists gathered for a Braille competition.
meanings.sent2: Our local community center has a supportive group of braillists.
meanings.sent3: The braillists organized a fun Braille scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: The braillists worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The braillists' dedication to Braille education is truly inspiring.
